name: Reykjavik Natura - Berjaya Iceland Hotels
description: This eco-friendly hotel is next to Öskjuhlíd Hill’s quiet woods and 1 km from Nauthólsvík geothermal beach. WiFi and gym access are free. A fridge, desk and satellite TV are standard in Berjaya Reykjavik Natura Hotel’s modern, soundproofed rooms. The in-house Satt Restaurant serves a breakfast buffet and Icelandic daily specials. The stylish Satt Bar is a nice place to relax and chat with others. The hotel is also home to the Icelandic Modern Art Exhibition. Other facilities include a tourist desk and spa facilities. Reykjavík city centre and Reykjavík Domestic Airport are within 5 minutes' drive.

name: Alda Hotel Reykjavik
description: Located on Laugavegur shopping street in central Reykjavik, this hotel offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Hallgrimskirkja Church is a 5-minute walk away. All guest rooms at Alda Hotel Reykjavík have a private bathroom with a bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms feature a private balcony with sea or city views. Guests enjoy free access to Alda Hotel’s gym, sauna and outdoor hot tub. Bicycles can be rented on site. Guests can also have a drink at the hotel bar. Reykjavik Art Museum is a 10-minute walk away. Lake Tjörnin is 1 km from the hotel.

name: Centerhotel Arnarhvoll
description: Located in central Reykjavik, across from The Harpa concert hall, this stylish hotel features modern Nordic design, free internet access and a top-floor restaurant offering panoramic city views. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Center Hotels Arnarhvoll’s rooms also include free wired internet access, tea/coffee facilities and a minibar. SKÝ Restaurant & Bar offers spectacular views towards the Harpa Concert Hall and the mountains. Discounted meals, drinks and snacks are available for guests. Leisure facilities at Arnarhvoll CenterHotel include a hot tub and sauna. The main shopping street, Laugavegur, is right around the corner. The Life of Whales sea safaris depart just 600 metres away.

name: Hilton Reykjavik Nordica
description: The contemporary Hilton Reykjavik Nordica hotel, situated in the financial district of the capital, is only a 5-minute walk from the spacious recreational and fitness area in Reykjavik, Laugardalur. This Reykjavik hotel is just a short journey from the city center. Enjoy a complimentary breakfast, free WiFi and access to the fitness facility. Hilton Reykjavik Spa and the renowned Vox Restaurant are both onsite. The hotel's setting is ideal for conferences or events with 11 function rooms for up to 650 guests. The hotel is nonsmoking. The central location allows for easy access to tours or perhaps golf playing. A constant flow of innovative music, theatre and other cultural events keep locals and visitors entertained all year round.Hilton

name: Hotel Ísland - Spa & Wellness Hotel
description: Featuring a wellness centre with a spa, beauty salon and yoga facilities, this hotel is 600 m from Reykjavik's main street, Laugavegur. A local bus stop is within a 5-minute walk and tour buses stop right outside the hotel. Laugardalur Park recreational area is within a 5-minute walk. Free parking is available. The rooms at Hótel Ísland Spa and Wellness feature a TV. Panoramic views of the mountains can be enjoyed from several rooms. The hotel's own contemporary Hekla Restaurant & Bar is open for lunch and dinner, and guests can enjoy food and drinks here. Laugardalslaug Public Pool is 1.3 km away from Hótel Ísland Spa and Wellness, while Kringlan Shopping Centre is 1.3 km away. Hlemmur Square is only 1.7 km away. Silfra Spa access is not permitted for guests under the age of 16

name: Reykjavik Konsulat Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to the Konsulate Hotel Reykjavik, Curio Collection by Hilton, where Icelandic history and style meet. Once a 1900’s department store operated by Consul Thomsen’s family, this charming building has been renovated with modern amenities and nods to Reykjavik’s vibrant culture. It’s a quick walk from our city center hotel to Iceland Parliament, Harpa Concert Hall, the Laugavegur main shopping street, and top restaurants and nightlife. Settle into a guest room that’s uniquely Iceland with eclectic architecture and natural building materials. Along with a 49-inch HDTV and complimentary WiFi, comforts include a mini-refrigerator, espresso machine, tea kettle and laptop-sized safe. Suites offer more space and a separate living area – treat yourself to a Diplomat Suite, a corner room with a beautiful private terrace. Our luxurious amenities will keep you relaxed and recharged for your stay. Indulge in treatments in the spa, featuring an original 19th-century stone wall that reflects Iceland’s tradition of natural bathing. An award-winning chef is at the helm of our hotel restaurant and bar, open all day, and the fitness center has everything you need for a full-body workout.Hilton

name: Radisson Blu 1919 Hotel Reykjavik
description: Centrally located, Radisson Blu 1919 Hotel Reykjavik offers easy access to Reykjavik's main sightseeing and retail areas. Just a short stroll from Reykjavik Cathedral, it provides comfortable rooms equipped with a mini bar, a private bathroom and converters/voltage adaptors. This relaxed hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a currency exchange and a concierge. Corporate amenities include a business centre. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the local nightlife. Those staying at Radisson Blu 1919 Hotel can enjoy the stylish rooms that offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a laptop safe. They all have a desk, ironing facilities and heating. To ensure the day gets off to a good start, a continental or a buffet breakfast is served each morning at Radisson Blu 1919 Hotel Reykjavik's restaurant. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants are also found nearby. Attractions near Radisson Blu 1919 Hotel include the National and University Library of Iceland, The Living Art Museum and the National Museum of Iceland. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Reykjavik.Revato

name: Hotel Borg By Keahotels
description: The elegant Art Deco-style Hotel Borg by Keahotels enjoys a central location in Reykjavik, overlooking the historic Asuturvollur Square. It offers brightly decorated rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen, Smart TVs. All rooms at Hotel Borg feature quality beds and Philippe Starck fittings. Each also has wooden floors and stylish art deco furniture. Guests can enjoy an in-house spa and gym that features a hot tub, sauna and steam room. It is also possible to book massages. The staff can help with bookings of tours and assist with car rental. Laugavegur shopping street is less than 200 metres from the hotel. The Life of Whales boat safari terminal is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Iceland Parliament Hotel, Curio Collection By Hilton
description: Our ideal location in the city center is next to Icelandic Parliament- Alþingi and across from Austurvollur. Reykjavik Cathedral, Harpa concert hall, and city hall are all just a five-minute walk away. Enjoy first-class dining at our restaurant and indulge in a trip to the spa. As a leading conference and event venue in Reykjavik, we offer 8,500 sq. ft. of event space.Hilton

name: Grand Hotel Reykjavik
description: This stylish hotel is 2 km from Reykjavik city centre, it features a wellness spa, bar, restaurant and free gym access. Guests can enjoy free WiFi and free parking. Hotel Reykjavík Grand’s spacious rooms have a flat-screen TV, tea/coffee facilities and a small fridge. Many of the rooms offer sea, mountain or city views. Leisure options at Hotel Reykjavík Grand include a spa and fitness centre. The spa offers a comprehensive range of treatments, including massages, facials and pedicures for a fee. Staff can recommend attractions such as the 25-metre high Perlan dome, which has a popular viewing deck. Grand Brasserie Restaurant offers delicious Icelandic and Nordic dishes.

name: 101 Hotel, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Iceland’s first boutique hotel, established in 2003, is owned by interior designer Ingibjörg S. Pálmadóttir. 101 hotel is an exciting entry into the world of Icelandic fashion, art and design, using modern lines, Icelandic artwork, and a palette of black, grey, and white. Keeping guests warm in the lounge are heated oak floors and a fireplace, while the hotel’s restaurant has a dapper and futuristic feel with its narrow bar, high walls and glass ceiling. This chic design hotel is a stylish haven for travellers from all over the world.Marriott

name: The Reykjavik Edition
description: The Reykjavik EDITION sets a new standard of luxury in Iceland's capital. Set against scenic mountain views on the Old Harbour, the hotel is conveniently located adjacent to Harpa, the landmark concert hall and conference center, and is just steps from Laugavegur, the main shopping street in downtown Reykjavik. Alongside 253 rooms are a collection of distinct restaurants and bars, including the 7th-floor Rooftop at EDITION, which is an ideal spot from which to enjoy the bright summer nights as well as the spectacular northern lights in the colder months. There is also a series of flexible meeting and event spaces, a nightclub and a pioneering social spa concept with a bar. The perfect location from which to explore Iceland's natural wonders, the Reykjavik EDITION is a vibrant new addition to the city's growing allure as a cosmopolitan destination.Marriott

name: Thingholt by Center Hotels
description: This stylish and original hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Reykjavik’s main shopping street, Laugavegur. It offers free WiFi and rooms with a satellite TV and a tea/coffee maker. At Thingholt by Center Hotels, the individually designed rooms feature a minibar, modern bathroom facilities and guest bathrobes. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. The hotel's Ísafold Restaurant offers a combination of Icelandic and internationally inspired dishes. The bar features modern lighting and a hip atmosphere for enjoying cocktails and company. Staff can help arrange day trips to the Blue Lagoon, snowmobile safaris, whale watching trips and other activities.

name: Midgardur by Center Hotels
description: Midgardur by Center Hotels is located on Reykjavik's main shopping street Laugavegur, and features an on-site bar, restaurant and free WiFi. Hallgrímskirkja Church is 800 metres away. The bright rooms at Midgardur by Center Hotels come with a flat-screen TV, minibar and private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Views of the sea, mountain or city are featured in certain rooms. The restaurant serves dishes based upon Icelandic tradition, mixed with modern and international flavours. Guests can also relax with a drink at the bar. Cafés, restaurants and shops can be found in the surroundings. Reykjavík Domestic Airport is 2.8 km away from Midgardur by Center Hotels.

name: Room With a View Hotel
description: Ideally located in the Reykjavík 101 district of Reykjavík, Room With a View Hotel is set 500 metres from Hallgrímskirkja Church, less than 1 km from Solfar Sun Voyager and 2.5 km from The Pearl. With modern family rooms, this property also provides guests with a balcony. The accommodation offers a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest near Room With a View Hotel include Harpa Concert Hall & Conference Centre, Reykjavik Old Harbour and Reykjavik Art Museum: Kjarvalsstadir. The nearest airport is Reykjavík Domestic Airport, 2.5 km from the accommodation.
